item.title: Dimea Days 2019
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: During 12. and 13. of Juny 2019 there was Dimea Days 2019 first run in the center of Brno, Czech Republic. The event took place at the museum at ‘Zelný trh’ near the main bus and train station ‘Hlavní nádraží’. The programme consisted mainly of eight cca 1h invited talks and one 1h10m poster session for presenting new research. The talks were combinatorial in nature and introduced the following concepts.
